name: RegexValidator_validateTest
description: Unit tests for the validate method of the RegexValidator class.

test_cases.name: testValidateNullInput
test_cases.description: Tests the validate method with null input, expecting a null return.

test_cases.name: testValidateSingleGroupMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the validate method with a single group match, expecting the first four characters of the matched group.

test_cases.name: testValidateMultipleGroupMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the validate method with multiple group matches, expecting concatenated groups.

test_cases.name: testValidateNoMatch
test_cases.description: Tests the validate method with no match, expecting a null return.
